ibm-appid-theme-color:
ibm_appid_theme_color

Create, update, or delete an IBM Cloud AppID Management Services theme color resource. For more information, see customizing the login widget
argument-reference:
Argument reference

Review the argument references that you can specify for your resource.

  • tenant_id - (Required, String) The AppID instance GUID
  • header_color - (Required, String) Header color for AppID login screen
import:
Import

The ibm_appid_theme_color resource can be imported by using the AppID tenant ID.

Syntax

bash
$ terraform import ibm_appid_theme_color.theme

Example

bash
$ terraform import ibm_appid_theme_color.theme 5fa344a8-d361-4bc2-9051-58ca253f4b2b
description:
ibm_appid_theme_color

Create, update, or delete an IBM Cloud AppID Management Services theme color resource. For more information, see customizing the login widget
